records.explanation: Your sugar levels are too low below normal
records.remedial_action: Ask a relative to take you to a hospital immediately. While at it, take 2 scoops of glucose or sweets or any other simple carbs (amounting to not less than 15g) to prevent the readings from dropping any further

records.explanation: Your sugar level is below normal
records.remedial_action: Eat 15-20 grams (g) of glucose or simple carbs, such as 1 tablespoon of honey, some candy, or a gel tube, then check your levels after 15 minutes.
records.recommendation: Sugar levels should generally not drop below 70mg/dl. If it drops below 50mg/dl then this is medically fatal.

records.explanation: Sugar level range is between 70 and 110 mg/dl
records.recommendation: Maintain a healthy lifestyle by eating healthy and doing exercises

records.explanation: Your sugar level is above normal
records.remedial_action: Exercise to reduce the blood sugar levels. Persistent high sugar levels lead to diabetic related complications
records.recommendation: Reduce your carbs/calories intake or increase your activity levels

records.explanation: Your sugar level is above normal
records.remedial_action: Try reducing your carbs/calories intake or increase your activity levels
records.recommendation: if high readings persit/have persisted, it is recommended that you have your HbA1c levels tested at a health facility to determine if you are diabetic.

records.explanation: Your sugar level is below normal
records.remedial_action: Eat 15-20 grams (g) of glucose or simple carbs, such as 1 tablespoon of honey, some candy, or a gel tube, then check your levels after 15 minutes.
records.recommendation: Sugar levels should generally not drop below 70mg/dl. If it drops below 50mg/dl then this is medically fatal.

records.explanation: Sugar level range is between 70 and 180 mg/dl
records.recommendation: Maintain a healthy lifestyle by eating healthy and doing exercises

records.explanation: Your sugar level is above normal
records.remedial_action: Exercise to reduce the blood sugar levels. Persistent high sugar levels lead to diabetic related complications
records.recommendation: Reduce your carbs/calories intake or increase your activity levels

records.explanation: Sugar level range is between 70 and 110 mg/dl
records.recommendation: Maintain a healthy lifestyle by eating healthy and doing exercises

records.explanation: Your sugar level is above normal
records.remedial_action: Reduce your carbs intake to the least possible
records.recommendation: It is recommended that you take the readings more regularly before meals to determine if it's a pattern of high blood sugar levels or not. If it is a pattern of high blood sugar levels then seek medical assistance.
